texts.name: Amber
texts.biography: Amber is similar with his father Andal from almost all aspects. She knew his father as a 'famous' smuggler who can always collect crystal and gems. The girl is good at business as well as his father. Nowadays she left his father because he chose to become a servant of King Bidley. She disagreed with his decision and finally decided to start a new life, with herself.

specialty.name: +1 Gems
specialty.description: Increases kingdom's gems production by 1 per day.
